I'm not even done with my game yet and I'm having issues where the loading speed online for playing my game is really harsh. I don't really want to have to ask people to download quest in order to play my game smoothly. 

Are there any other websites that host quest games or a way to host the quest game yourself? I've looked a little bit into hosting it on my own but I haven't gotten a straight answer.
